SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

curam.util.persistence
Interface Validator

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePlusConcreteTableImpl, LinkTableImpl, SingleTableEntityImpl, SingleTableLogicallyDeleteableEntityImpl
@Implementable
public interface Validator

Standard validation and specification of default values.

Method Summary
 void crossEntityValidation()
          Validates that changes made to this entity on the database are consistent with other entities.
 void crossFieldValidation()
          Validates that all the field values held are valid with respect to each other.
 void mandatoryFieldValidation()
          Validates that all mandatory fields (as presented by the API) are "populated".
 void setNewInstanceDefaults()
          Sets default values for new instances which have not yet been inserted onto the database.
 

Method Detail

crossEntityValidation

void crossEntityValidation()
Validates that changes made to this entity on the database are consistent with other entities. Any errors detected should be raised as informationals.

crossFieldValidation

void crossFieldValidation()
Validates that all the field values held are valid with respect to each other. Any errors detected should be raised as informationals. The entity manager infrastructure enforces that no database access occurs in this method. Only data held on this entity may be accessed.

mandatoryFieldValidation

void mandatoryFieldValidation()
Validates that all mandatory fields (as presented by the API) are "populated". The implementation is free to decide:
  • which fields are mandatory; and
  • how to determine whether a mandatory field is "populated".
Any errors detected should be raised as informationals. The entity manager infrastructure enforces that no database access occurs in this method. Only data held on this entity may be accessed.

setNewInstanceDefaults

void setNewInstanceDefaults()
Sets default values for new instances which have not yet been inserted onto the database.
